comments:
The HTML and PDF emitters work, but I get a NPE while using the Excel Emitter.

The failure occurs in RC2, RC3, and the nightly build 2.2.0-N20070619

The bug 180900 was marked as resolved, and I could not change the status (I was not the owner or the original reporter of the issue).  Hence, I opened this bug.

Design file to reproduce the emitter error

Need to change the FILELIST to point to the correct location.

BIRT designer does not display an problems with the file, and displays correct in the designer view.  However, causes a problem with the Excel emitter in the designer.

Data Source for the design file.
the bug already fixed, pls check in new nightly build

I just re-downloaded 
birt-report-designer-all-in-one-2.2.0-N20070619.zip

The Excel emitter is causing the following exception
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.emitter.excel.DataCache.getColumnSize(DataCache.java:75)

The Report Engine RC2, RC3, and the nightly build N20070619 are all causing the NullPointerException to occur.

I am able to produce HTML and PDF, but not Excel.

Have you tried the Design file I have provided?  
Do we need to do a gotomeeting for me to demonstrate the behavior?
close the bug for QA's test.
My apologies, I misread the resolve status as closed.  Sorry.
